projects.title: Neural Network Visualizer
projects.description: An interactive 3D visualization of neural networks using WebGL and TensorFlow.js. Users can train models in real-time and watch the network learn through stunning 3D graphics.

projects.title: Quantum Computing Simulator
projects.description: A revolutionary quantum computing simulator with real-time qubit visualization, quantum circuit builder, and interactive quantum algorithms demonstration.

projects.title: Metaverse Social Platform
projects.description: A next-generation social platform built in 3D space with real-time avatars, voice chat, and immersive environments powered by WebGL and WebRTC.

projects.title: AI-Powered Design System
projects.description: An intelligent design system that generates UI components using machine learning, with real-time collaboration and automated accessibility testing.

projects.title: Real-Time 3D Data Visualization
projects.description: A cutting-edge data visualization platform that renders complex datasets in real-time 3D with interactive exploration and AI-powered insights.

projects.title: Blockchain Explorer 3D
projects.description: A revolutionary blockchain explorer with 3D network visualization, real-time transaction tracking, and AI-powered fraud detection.

projects.title: AR Web Experience
projects.description: A web-based augmented reality experience using WebXR, computer vision, and real-time object recognition for immersive interactions.

projects.title: AI Music Composer
projects.description: An AI-powered music composition tool that generates original music using machine learning, with real-time collaboration and 3D audio visualization.

projects.title: Real-Time Ray Tracer
projects.description: A real-time ray tracer built with WebGL compute shaders, featuring physically-based rendering, global illumination, and interactive scene editing.

projects.title: Quantum Game Engine
projects.description: A revolutionary game engine that incorporates quantum mechanics principles, featuring quantum physics simulation and AI-driven gameplay.
projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and responsive design.

projects.title: Task Management Dashboard
projects.description: A collaborative project management tool with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features. Built with Vue.js and Firebase.

projects.title: Weather Application
projects.description: A beautiful weather app with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and detailed weather analytics. Features 7-day forecasts and real-time updates.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website with smooth animations, dark/light mode toggle, and optimized performance. Built with vanilla JavaScript and CSS.

projects.title: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive social media analytics dashboard that aggregates data from multiple platforms. Features data visualization, reporting, and scheduling tools.

projects.title: Recipe Finder App
projects.description: A recipe discovery app with ingredient-based search, nutritional information, and meal planning features. Includes user-generated content and ratings.
